Summary: Every star in sky started blinking and changing colors as we witnessed what i would describe as a fleet of UFOs went by.I know the stars cant do that so i assume that something was between my line of sight and the stars. It was the most amazing thing.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around October 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a family member were sitting on her back porch discussing God. The end of the world area 51 the tech leap after that when a shooting star caught our eye to the right. Then every star in the sky in front of us started blinking like crazy and turning colors . Then we noticed a fleet of white lights moving from right to left in front of us and as they went by the stars behind them quit blinking and turning colors. This lasted from about 3AM to 3:15 AM and we were both blown away by what we just wittnessed especially bcuz we were just talking about God and Aliens.
